summary: 2008 KENWORTH T800B. CONSUMER STATES SEVERAL PROBLEMS WITH VEHICLE TO INCLUDE LIQUID NATURAL GAS LEAKS *TGW  THE CONSUMER STATED HE WAS PROMISED A WARRANTY ON THE LNG SYSTEM BY THE MANUFACTURER OF THE LNG SYSTEM IN THE TRUCK. HE WAS INFORMED HE COULD ONLY GET THE TRUCK SERVICED BY KENWORTH. HE HAS EXPERIENCED NUMEROUS PROBLEMS WITH THE LNG SYSTEM INCLUDING LIQUID GAS LEAKS OVERNIGHT WHICH CAUSED FREEZING ON THE TANK. SEVERAL VACUUMS HAD BEEN PERFORMED ON THE TANK TO TRY AND GET THE TANK TO WORK, BECAUSE NO ONE WANTED TO REPLACE THE TANK. *JB
